goal.ch: 訓練修課學生了解植物組織培養的基本知識與操作技術
goal.en: To train the students to understand the knowledges and operating techniques of plant tissure culture

outline.ch:
"1. Introduction
2. Growth of callus and cell suspension cultures
3. Regeneration of tissues cultures
4. Haploid cultures
5. Protoplast cultures
6. Preservation and cryopreservation of germplasm
7. Selection for somaclonal variants
8. Secondary product synthesis
9. Micropropagation techniques in horticulture and crop improvement
10. Genetic manipulation of crop plants"
outline.en:
"1. Introduction
2. Growth of callus and cell suspension cultures
3. Regeneration of tissues cultures
4. Haploid cultures
5. Protoplast cultures
6. Preservation and cryopreservation of germplasm
7. Selection for somaclonal variants
8. Secondary product synthesis
9. Micropropagation techniques in horticulture and crop improvement
10. Genetic manipulation of crop plants"

textbook.ch: Ancient reports of plant tissue culture
textbook.en: Ancient reports of plant tissue culture
